pages.text: The story I found in Everbright spoke of a flood that covered much of the land, including many cities. Through my travels, I have come across a new city, this one almost completely submerged. I descended into its depths and found an enormous fish-like creature at the city's center.
This discovery makes me think that the story I read was real, and that the flooding was caused by something similar to what caused the giant craters near the bunker.
